cast.name: 马赫什·曼杰瑞卡 Mahesh Manjrekar

introduction: Jaggu is faced with a crisis when he isn't able to fulfill his wife's dreams of a better lifestyle or his mother's wish for a grandchild. Jaggu's wife will bear his child only when they become rich and his job as a recovery agent doesn't seem to help. Jaggu gets a job offer from a bank where he must capture a criminal who absconded with lakhs of money. He sets up a team of misfits to travel to the UK where he must capture the clever criminal and collect his reward.
